text: Fabien Lamirault (born 17 March 1980) is a French para table tennis player. He has won three world titles, three European titles and two Paralympic titles in para table tennis, he has won team titles with Stephane Molliens and Jean- François Ducay. Lamirault became a quadriplegic in 1998 after a car accident and he started playing table tennis during his rehabilitation. ==References== == External links == * * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:French male table tennis players Category:Paralympic table tennis players of France Category:Medalists at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Table tennis players at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Table tennis players at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic medalists in table tennis Category:Paralympic gold medalists for France Category:Paralympic silver medalists for France Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for France
title: Fabien Lamirault
